# Mstest Analyzers Docs

> Documentation for Mstest Analyzers Docs.

- [MSTest Design rules (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/design-rules.md): Learn about MSTest code analysis design rules.
- [MSTEST0001: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0001.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0001: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
- [MSTEST0002: Test classes should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0002.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0002: Test classes should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0003: Test methods should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0003.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0003: Test methods should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0004: Public types should be test classes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0004.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0004: Public types should be test classes
- [MSTEST0005: Test context property should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0005.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0005: Test context property should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0006: Avoid '[ExpectedException]'](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0006.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0006: Avoid '[ExpectedException]'
- [MSTEST0007: Use test attributes only on test methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0007.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0007: Ensure test attributes are set only on methods marked with the `TestMethod` attribute
- [MSTEST0008: TestInitialize method should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0008.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0008: TestInitialize method should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0009: TestCleanup method should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0009.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0009: TestCleanup method should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0010: ClassInitialize method should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0010.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0010: ClassInitialize method should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0011: ClassCleanup method should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0011.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0011: ClassCleanup method should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0012: AssemblyInitialize method should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0012.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0012: AssemblyInitialize method should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0013: AssemblyCleanup method should have valid layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0013.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0013: AssemblyCleanup method should have valid layout
- [MSTEST0014: DataRow should be valid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0014.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0014: DataRow should be valid
- [MSTEST0015: Test method should not be ignored](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0015.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0015: Test method should not be ignored
- [MSTEST0016: Test class should have test method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0016.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0016: Test class should have test method
- [MSTEST0017: Assertion arguments should be passed in the correct order](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0017.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0017: Assertion arguments should be passed in the correct order
- [MSTEST0018: DynamicData should be valid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0018.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0018: DynamicData should be valid
- [MSTEST0019: Prefer TestInitialize methods over constructors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0019.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0019: Prefer TestInitialize methods over constructors
- [MSTEST0020: Prefer constructors over TestInitialize methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0020.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0020: Prefer constructors over TestInitialize methods
- [MSTEST0021: Prefer Dispose over TestCleanup methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0021.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0021: Prefer Dispose over TestCleanup methods
- [MSTEST0022: Prefer TestCleanup over Dispose methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0022.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0022: Prefer TestCleanup over Dispose methods
- [MSTEST0023: Do not negate boolean assertions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0023.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0023: Do not negate boolean assertions
- [MSTEST0024: Do not store TestContext in a static member](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0024.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0024: Do not store TestContext in a static member
- [MSTEST0025: Use 'Assert.Fail' instead of an always-failing assert](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0025.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0025: Use 'Assert.Fail' instead of an always-failing assert
- [MSTEST0026: Avoid conditional access in assertions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0026.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0026: Avoid conditional access in assertions
- [MSTEST0027: Use Async suffix for async methods suppressor.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0027.md): Learn about code suppressor MSTEST0027: Use Async suffix for async methods suppressor.
- [MSTEST0028: Use Async suffix for async methods suppressor.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0028.md): Learn about code suppressor MSTEST0028: Use Async suffix for async methods suppressor.
- [MSTEST0029: Public method should be test method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0029.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0029: Public method should be test method
- [MSTEST0030: Type containing `[TestMethod]` should be marked with `[TestClass]`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0030.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0030: Type containing `[TestMethod]` should be marked with `[TestClass]`, otherwise the test method will be silently ignored.
- [MSTEST0031: `System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute` has no effect on test methods.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0031.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0031: `System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute` has no effect in the context of tests, so likely user wanted to use `Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DescriptionAttribute` instead.
- [MSTEST0032: Review or remove the assertion as its condition is known to be always true.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0032.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0032: Review or remove the assertion as its condition is known to be always true.
- [MSTEST0033: Non-nullable reference not initialized suppressor.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0033.md): Learn about code suppressor MSTEST0033: Non-nullable reference not initialized suppressor.
- [MSTEST0034: Use `ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass` with the `[ClassCleanup]`.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0034.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0034: Use `ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass` with the `[ClassCleanup]`.
- [MSTEST0035: [DeploymentItem] can be specified only on test class or test method.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0035.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0035: `[DeploymentItem]` can be specified only on test class or test method.
- [MSTEST0036: Do not use shadowing inside test class.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0036.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0036: Do not use shadowing inside test class.
- [MSTEST0037: Use proper 'Assert' methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0037.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0037: Use proper 'Assert' methods.
- [MSTEST0038: Don't use 'Assert.AreSame' or 'Assert.AreNotSame' with value types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0038.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0038: Don't use 'Assert.AreSame' or 'Assert.AreNotSame' with value types
- [MSTEST0039: Use newer 'Assert.Throws' methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0039.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0039: Use 'Assert.ThrowsExactly' instead of 'Assert.ThrowsException'
- [MSTEST0040: Do not assert inside 'async void' contexts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0040.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0040: Do not assert inside 'async void' methods, local functions, or lambdas because they may not fail the test
- [MSTEST0041: Use 'ConditionBaseAttribute' on test classes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0041.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0041: Use 'ConditionBaseAttribute' on test classes
- [MSTEST0042: Avoid duplicated 'DataRow' entries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0042.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0042: Avoid duplicated 'DataRow' entries
- [MSTEST0043: Use retry attribute on test method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0043.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0043: Use retry attribute on test method
- [MSTEST0044: Prefer TestMethod over DataTestMethod](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0044.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0044: Prefer TestMethod over DataTestMethod
- [MSTEST0045: Use cooperative cancellation for timeout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0045.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0045: Use cooperative cancellation for timeout
- [MSTEST0046: Use Assert instead of StringAssert](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0046.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0046: Use Assert instead of StringAssert
- [MSTEST0048: Avoid TestContext properties in fixture methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0048.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0048: Avoid TestContext properties in fixture methods
- [MSTEST0049: Flow TestContext cancellation token](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0049.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0049: Flow TestContext cancellation token
- [MSTEST0050: Global test fixture should be valid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0050.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0050: Global test fixture should be valid
- [MSTEST0051: Assert.Throws should contain only a single statement](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0051.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0051: Assert.Throws should contain only a single statement
- [MSTEST0052: Avoid passing an explicit 'DynamicDataSourceType' and use the default auto detect behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0052.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0052: Avoid passing an explicit 'DynamicDataSourceType' and use the default auto detect behavior
- [MSTEST0053: Avoid using Assert methods with format parameters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0053.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0053: Avoid using Assert methods with format parameters
- [MSTEST0054: Use TestContext.CancellationToken instead of TestContext.CancellationTokenSource.Token](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0054.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0054: Use TestContext.CancellationToken instead of TestContext.CancellationTokenSource.Token
- [MSTEST0055: Do not ignore the return value of string methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0055.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0055: Do not ignore the return value of string methods
- [MSTEST0056: Use DisplayName property for test method display names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0056.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0056: Use DisplayName property for test method display names
- [MSTEST0057: Propagate source information in custom test method attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0057.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0057: Propagate source information in custom test method attributes
- [MSTEST0058: Avoid assertions in catch blocks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0058.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0058: Avoid assertions in catch blocks
- [MSTEST0059: Do not use both Parallelize and DoNotParallelize attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0059.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0059: Do not use both Parallelize and DoNotParallelize attributes
- [MSTEST0060: Avoid duplicate test method attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0060.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0060: Avoid duplicate test method attributes
- [MSTEST0061: Use OSCondition attribute instead of runtime checks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0061.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0061: Use OSCondition attribute instead of runtime checks
- [MSTEST0062: Avoid out and ref parameters in test methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/mstest0062.md): Learn about code analysis rule MSTEST0062: Avoid out and ref parameters in test methods
- [MSTest code analysis](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/overview.md): Learn about the MSTest code analysis.
- [MSTest Performance rules (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/performance-rules.md): Learn about MSTest code analysis performance rules.
- [MSTest Suppression rules (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/suppression-rules.md): Learn about MSTest code suppression rules.
- [MSTest Usage rules (code analysis)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/mstest-analyzers/usage-rules.md): Learn about MSTest code analysis usage rules.
